trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_SEQ_00<tab>Virgeaume needs someone to help him with his new trap.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_SEQ_01<tab>Virgeaume has designed a new chocobo trap, and needs you to obtain a key component. Take yourself to the caves to the south and look for a lampshade mushroom.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the lampshade mushroom. Deliver it to Virgeaume, who awaits you at Tailfeather.

TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_SEQ_03<tab>Virgeaume chops up the mushroom and mixes it well with some regular gysahl greens. Next, he bids you take this peculiar salad upstream and place it on a bed of straw he has prepared.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_SEQ_04<tab>You have placed the gysahl greens on the straw. Report the completion of your task to Virgeaume.

TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_SEQ_05<tab>Virgeaume proudly explains to you the workings of the trap. The mushroom induces drowsiness in chocobos, rendering them easier to capture, and without risk of causing injury.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a lampshade mushroom.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the lampshade to Virgeaume.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_TODO_02<tab>Place the gysahl greens on the straw.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_TODO_03<tab>Report to Virgeaume.

TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_000<tab>Ah, you've come at the perfect time. I've designed a new trap that's sure to snare even the cleverest of chocobos, and I need someone to help me with the final step.

TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_001<tab>Do you know the caves south of here? Rare glowing mushrooms called lampshades grow there, and they are essential to my trap. Could you fetch me one while I work on the finishing touches?
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_010<tab>The mushrooms I need grow in the caves to the south. Please fetch me one while I see to the finishing touches on my trap.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_030<tab>There you are. Do you have the mushroom?
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_031<tab>Yes, this glow is unmistakable! Now I have but to chop it up and mix it with some gysahl greens...

TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_032<tab>And with that, the bait is ready! Seeing as you're already here, might I ask you for one more favor? A short distance upstream, you'll find a bed of straw. I need you to put these <var 1A 02 /var>special<var 1A 01 /var> gysahl greens on top of it.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_040<tab>A short distance upstream, you'll find a bed of straw. I need you to put the <var 1A 02 /var>special<var 1A 01 /var> gysahl greens on top of it.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>The gysahl greens have been placed.

TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_060<tab>...You've placed the bait? Good! Now, you're doubtless curious as to how the trap works. It is truly simple: the mushroom you brought induces drowsiness in chocobos.
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_VIRGEAUME_000_061<tab>This will allow us to capture the birds without risk of causing them injury. Far gentler than pitfalls, wouldn't you say?
TEXT_HEAVNZ209_01778_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>This appears to be the bed of straw Virgeaume mentioned. Place the gysahl greens on top.
